RoboCupBotEnv module¶

RoboCupBotEnv.load_config_file_2_dict(_FILENAME: str) → dict¶
Input

directory where the .ini file is

Converts a config file into a meaninful dictionary

DataTypes that reads

lists of the format [20,30,10], both integers and floats floats when a . is found booleans valid by configparser .getboolean() integer strings
